title: LeBron's Life is Easier, MLB Free Agents Are Boats & Drew Brees
itunes:title: LeBron's Life is Easier, MLB Free Agents Are Boats & Drew Brees
description:
Colin explains why LeBron James embracing the changes to the NBA game have helped prolong his career. Also, he explains why analytics are a nightmare for NFL defensive players. Plus, Colin discusses the MLB trade deadline and why he believes pending free agents should be valued like boats. And Colin defends Michigan Football HC Jim Harbaugh and tells you why the media has it all wrong about him. Guests: FS1 NBA analyst Jim Jackson, New Orleans Saints quarterback Drew Brees, & NFL Network analyst Bucky Brooks

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
